did.unittitle: Richard Riversdale Glyn letterbook and report card
did.abstract: Collection consists of a letterbook, 1858-1859, and report card, 1888. Letters from Glyn to his parents during his service in India. Glyn wrote candidly of the trials of military life and of his leaders, including Sir James Hope Grant. He described people and events seen during the Rifle Brigade's pursuit of fleeing rebels. Frequently he complained of problems with the postal service and of mail interception by the enemy.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Richard Riversdale Glyn was a captain in the Rifle Brigade during the Sepoy Rebellion.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
